title: Ford 8N Tractor and Implements | Building A Homestead In 7 Days

subtasks: Install and monitor the battery disconnect switch.
Engage the starter switch to start the tractor.
Check fuel levels and address fuel-related issues.
Replace a worn pin in the rear of the tractor.
Ensure safety features like a PTO cover are in place.
Adjust transmission gears for various tasks.
Revive and restore agricultural implements, such as a disc harrow and plow.
Design and implement safety modifications for tractor attachments.
Utilize a back scoop for material collection and distribution.
Construct a hilling machine for weed management.
Adapt tractor attachments for specific tasks, like snow removal.
Propose and construct modifications to improve implement functionality.
